task.title: Add Dictionaries for the Hunspell Checker

context.p: To add new spelling dictionaries to , or to replace an existing one, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download the files you need for your language dictionary.
The downloaded .oxt file is a zip archive. If you are creating a new dictionary, copy the .aff and .dic files from this archive in the spell subfolder of the preferences folder.
step.info:
The preferences folder is [APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER]/com.oxygenxml[APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER]/com.oxygenxml.author>[APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER]/com.oxygenxml.developer, where [APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER] is:
C:\Users\[USER-NAME]\AppData\Roaming on Windows Vista/7/8/10
[USER-HOME-FOLDER]/Library/Preferences on OS X
[USER-HOME-FOLDER] on Linux

step.cmd: If you are updating an existing dictionary, copy the .aff and .dic files into the following folder: /dicts/spell.
Restart the application after copying the dictionary files.

itemgroup.note: You can specify that includes dictionaries and term lists from a custom location by selecting the Include dictionaries and term list from option and specifying its path in the Dictionaries preferences page.
